description: Housed in the TAD (Treviso Arts District) building, a designer-style concept store, Vite (Vision Inspired Through Emotions) serves modern reinterpretations of traditional cuisine with a recognisable style and a careful balance of flavours. There are two tasting menus (“La Marca” and “Frût”, which focus on meat and fish respectively), as well as “Green Pow”, a vegetable-based menu available by prior reservation. There is also a 10-course surprise menu (“I’m a pickle, Morty!”, a tribute to the series “Rick and Morty”) from which you can order individual dishes.
